title: Sudan ARABIC Cardano Community
description: Sudan is struggling to overcome 30 yrs. of authoritarian rule that has left the economy in tatters  and the country on the brink of collapse

f6_assessments.q0: Bringing awareness to Sudan will help with adoption and awareness in Africa for Cardano. translated material and introductory courses are a great place to lay a foundation.
f6_assessments.q1: They have the experience and a plan that can be implemented successfully. It is arguable that the plan doesnt go far enough as to how and where they funnel their stundents after they finish the course.
f6_assessments.q2: The timeline is not very clear as to milestones and key measurables. They can measure how many successfully complete the course and set up a wallet, but they dont explain how they can measure the ROI of this proposal.

solution: Growing a Sudan Cardano community will contribute to finding solutions that will address some of the wicked challenges facing the country.
experience: 30 years experience in development contexts and working with communities across the country combined with WADA's 20+ years of tech expertise
